attributes.action: Create public bathrooms for transgender people.
attributes.additional_details: Imagine a fully transitioned transgender woman, feminine build, features for example boobs, higher pitched voice, facial structure walking in to a mans bathroom. Is that not creating more danger? Is that not making every biological man in that bathroom whether trans or not even more uncomfortable? If we cant all be together, all women, all men, simply just create bathrooms for trans people where they are in a bathroom with their own gender and community, at ease.
attributes.background: Just like the usual public bathrooms for men and women all over the world, make public bathrooms for transgender men and women here in the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following:

Make Gender Neutral Toilets a legal requirement in all public areas
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725623

Introduce a legal requirement for transgender and non-binary only spaces
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725239
